name: Saturn Quest: Blast Effect
description:
Captain Navigator returns! Effective and Radical Blast processing cosmic star action Saturn Quest: Blast Effect! Over 9000 Mega Power! Fire! Laser! Universe!

"The 8 Bit Universe is in grave danger. De-morphing planetary virus (Planetus) is infecting galaxies one by one. Only the true hero can save the universe. Captain Navigator - The Legend of Stars - and his personal ambassador Roro the Mother-brain are searching the Dark Paths for the source of Planetus. They are close now. Good luck, Captain! All known races believe in you!"

Saturn Quest: Blast Effect is a story-driven action adventure game set in the human-less galaxy far far away. Fly, climb, shoot, explore the world and fight the giant bosses in this 8 Bit style Space Opera, full of drama and epic.

Features:

  • Arcade Style Action!
  • Blast processing!
  • Square Pixels!
  • Retro Style Chip-tunes!
  • Aaargh!!
